YOUR_FRIEND: ^<color=#555555>(he's still conscious. we don't have much time...)</color>

s0: ^<color=#555555>"In honor to the GREAT FAIRY, defender of the woods."</color>

KOROK_FRONT_HOUSE: ^hi! do you wanna be my friend?

s0: ^today i ate a ton of snails at lunch!
^it was the most delicious thing i have ever eaten in my entire life!!
s1: ^exploring the northern caves was really the right choice.
^they are terrifying, but it was worth it. you know how the saying goes...
^i don't know why you came, and honestly i don't care...
^i'm tired of these human beings destroying our WOODS!!
s2: ^but since you're here, check out our newest statue. isn't it pretty?

s0: ^there are people that eat plants. don't you think that's absurd?
s1: ^WE are plants. would you eat ME? (please don't answer)
s2: ^i come here every day to look at the plants... to feel my connection to them...
s4: ^uhh, could you please leave me alone...

s1: ^they keep digging, looking for water underground.
s3: ^i empathize with them, because i too am always thirsty.

s0: ^EVERY MORNING THERE'S A NEW TREE HERE ON THE MINE.
^TELL ME. HAVE YOU EVER SEEN A TREE THAT GROWS IN JUST ONE NIGHT?
s1: ^I'M STARTING TO THINK THAT THOSE ANNOYING PLANTS ARE PRANKING ME
^AREN'T THEY AWARE HOW DANGEROUS A TREE CAN BE NEXT TO THE ORES?
^OR DO THEY WANT TO REPEAT THE <anim=LightPos>OLD MINE INCIDENT</anim>?

s0: ^hi! i think it's going to rain. don't you?
^Good afternoon my name is Coach Jonas. Would you like an entrepeneurship lesson?
s1: ^I have moved into this region wanting peace and quiet. But on arriving I discovered that the water has a faint taste of mud.
^Instead of being PASSIVE about it, I was <anim=SlowSine>PROACTIVE</anim>.
^I studied the <anim=SlowSine>LAYOUT</anim> of the <anim=SlowSine>REGIÓN</anim> and built my own <anim=SlowSine>PLUMBING</anim>.
^(The plumbing was hard. Did you know that tubes can only follow straight lines? I didn't)
s2: ^Now I have access to the <anim=LightPos>PUREST WATER</anim>!!!
^What? You know someone who's sick? Well, I feel for you...
^The packages aren't ready yet! Come back after two weeks.

s0: ^i love the water of the lake, without it i'd die of thirst!
s1: ^many people complain that it tastes like mud, but i don't get it. mud is delicious! <color=#bbbbbb>(i'm a plant)</color>
^i wonder if these people have ever TASTED mud to make this dumb comparison!
s2: ^recently there was an idiot that kept complaining about it. i myself sent him away from our village. good riddance!
^i hope he's already dead of thirst!<anim=LightPos>!!!</anim>

s0: ^<color=#ed63d8><anim=SlowestSine>snails gets me high... get it... high...</anim></color>

BEGINNING_CUTSCENE:
^You've been on the road for 5 days.

You don't mind carrying his body. It's heavy, but you can take it.

What bothers you is that you don't know if your plan is a good one.

^Does She really exist? And if she does, is She capable of everything they say?

...

Nobody found Her and returned to tell the tale.

You'll have to be the first.

s0: ^<anim=LightPos>uhhh... i don't know if i wanna be friends...</anim>
